title: Drawing, "Sketch from South America", 1853
markings: Verso: Stamped in black ink, at lower right: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left: 2 - Mountains; and again at center: 2 [Possibly inscribed at lower left and erased ? LHC 6/21/2006]
description: Horizontal view of a mountainous bank of a bay with a slope at left and trees including a palm at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch from South America", 1853.
1853. Graphite on light gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-116.
